## Patumrat data

```{r}
patumrat_data <- read.csv("../analysis/IQtree_LSD/data/dataset_freezed28Jul25.csv")


```

```{r}
library(dplyr)

patumrat_data <- patumrat_data %>%
  select(-starts_with("formatted"), -starts_with("othermem"))

# We look at the NA, and get rid of 10 columns
sort(colSums(is.na(patumrat_data)), decreasing = TRUE)
patumrat_data <- patumrat_data[, colSums(is.na(patumrat_data)) <= 285]



```
